title: Glamorous Shijiazhuang Landmark Hotel within Fashionable Yuhua District
description: Experience luxurious InterContinental hospitality at the landmark InterContinental Shijiazhuang, an IHG Hotel Located in the city's fashionable Yuhua district and boasting easy access to the Golf Club and Century Park, as well as panoramic views of the city, the the landmark InterContinental Shijiazhuang, an IHG Hotel is ideal for business travellers looking to entertain, or those seeking upscale dining and entertainment options. Plunge into the littering indoor pool, enjoy a visit the full-service spa and discover the nearby Shiyan Lake or Hotpot Museum.
offer_address: No. 119 Huai An East Road, Yuhua District, Shijiazhuang, 050030, China
